comment: This app is absolutely amazing I've used this for almost a year, but I am facing 2 problems. 1. We do not have a history tab, suppose we watch a video and accidentally restart the app so you'll never be able to find that video, unless you saved it. Please add a history tab!! 2. This is the biggest issue I'm facing, since a while ago, I can't hear the audio of most of the videos and if I want to listen it I have to save it and then watch it. Please fix this glitch ASAP!!
scenarios: Watch a video and accidentally restart the app, then be unable to find that video unless it was saved, due to the absence of a history tab.
Inability to hear the audio of most videos unless they are saved and then watched.
key sentence: Inability to hear the audio of most videos unless they are saved and then watched.

operations.event: click<button id=6 class ="com.pinterest:id/lego_pin_grid_cell_id" alt="Video pin from Afortunat:, Title: 𝖨𝗌 𝖫𝗂𝗄𝖾 𝖸𝗈𝗎 𝖺𝗋𝖾 𝖬𝗒 𝗆𝗂𝗋𝗋𝗈𝗋💚, This may contain: two fluffy white animals sitting on top of green grass next to each other in front of water droplets">  </button>
